stripped_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "click, trash: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[click], [trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
title: Contract Killer
